name: Grilled Yellow Squash
author: Sarah Stephan
summary: This is a tasty way to use up all the yellow squash you have pouring out of your garden every summer. I also do this same thing with zucchini.
ingredients: ½ cup extra virgin olive oil
directions: Preheat the grill for medium heat
Cut the squash horizontally into 1/4 inch to 1/2 inch thick slices so that you have nice long strips that won't fall through the grill
Heat olive oil in a small pan, and add garlic cloves
Cook over medium heat until the garlic starts to sizzle and become fragrant
Brush the slices of squash with the garlic oil, and season with salt and pepper
Grill squash slices for 5 to 10 minutes per side, until they reach the desired tenderness
Brush with additional garlic oil, and turn occasionally to prevent sticking or burning
